## copyDir() function

Copies from source to target and overrides the target. But does not delete extra files

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function copyDir(aSrc: string, aDst: string, aHost: Tree, aLogger?: Logger): Tree;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aSrc | <code>string</code> | source directory |
|  aDst | <code>string</code> | target directory |
|  aHost | <code>Tree</code> | tree |
|  aLogger | <code>Logger</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Tree`

the tree
